details.sectionContent: Club your knowledge with technical & aerobics to make it through the laser maze.
o This round is a basic elimination. o The participants will be given a quiz and those whoâ€™ll crack it will proceed to round 2.
o In this round participants will have to complete a maze and set the mirrors to beam the laser light at the end of the circuit to make it through to the next round. o This is an elimination round.
o The teams will have to play the laser maze game.
